doc:
Hazel Adair https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hazel_Adair 0 Hazel Adair (born Hazel Joyce Willett, 9 July 1920 – 22 November 2015) was a British actress turned screenwriter and creator of soap operas for radio and television. She is best known for co-creating Crossroads with Peter Ling. Hazel_Adair ( born Hazel_Joyce_Willett , 9_July_1920 – 22_November_2015 ) was a_British_actress turned screenwriter_and_creator of soap_operas for radio_and_television . She is_best_known for co-creating Crossroads with Peter_Ling .
